title: recipes_Kendra's_Maid-Rite_Sandwiches
text:
Title: Kendra's Maid-Rite Sandwiches.
.
Description: Brown sugar, mustard, and Worcestershire sauce flavor this Midwestern icon..
.
Ingredients:.
- 2 pounds ground beef.
- 1 chopped onion.
- 0.75 cup ketchup.
- 2 tablespoons brown sugar.
- 2 tablespoons distilled white vinegar.
- 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce.
- 2 teaspoons prepared yellow mustard.
- 0.5 teaspoon salt.
- 16 hamburger buns, warmed.
.
Instructions:.
- Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat and stir in the ground beef and onion. Cook and stir until the beef is crumbly, evenly browned, and no longer pink. Drain and discard any excess grease. Stir in the ketchup, brown sugar, vinegar, Worcestershire sauce, mustard, and salt. Bring to a simmer, then reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer 20 minutes longer. Serve on warmed buns..
.
Nutrients:.
calories: 244 kcal.
carbohydrateContent: 27 g.
cholesterolContent: 34 mg.
fiberContent: 1 g.
proteinContent: 13 g.
saturatedFatContent: 3 g.
sodiumContent: 483 mg.

fatContent: 9 g.
unsaturatedFatContent: 0 g.
.
Serves: 16 servings.
